statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT patent_owner, patent_id FROM pharmaceutical_patents ORDER BY patent_owner DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE transaction_type = 'license';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patent_owner, transaction_type FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE transaction_date < '2021-06-01' ORDER BY transaction_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents ORDER BY patent_owner DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT patent_id, patent_owner FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE transaction_type = 'License' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(patent_id) AS highest_patent_id FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT patent_owner FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE transaction_type = 'Transfer';
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE owner_id = 1001;
SELECT patent_id, patent_name FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE acquisition_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patent_id, owner_name FROM pharmaceutical_patents ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT owner_id FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT * FROM patent_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'transfer' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT patent_name, owner_name FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE owner_id = 5;
SELECT patent_name, acquisition_date FROM pharmaceutical_patents ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT patent_name, owner_name, transaction_type FROM pharmaceutical_patents JOIN patent_transactions ON pharmaceutical_patents.patent_id = patent_transactions.patent_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patents FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT patent_name, current_owner FROM pharmaceutical_patents ORDER BY patent_name DESC;
SELECT patent_name, current_owner, acquisition_date FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE current_owner = 'Company A';
SELECT * FROM patent_acquisitions JOIN pharmaceutical_patents ON patent_acquisitions.acquired_patent_id = pharmaceutical_patents.patent_id;
SELECT transfer_id, transfer_from, transfer_to FROM patent_transfers ORDER BY transfer_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents LIMIT 5;
SELECT patent_name, current_owner FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE acquisition_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY patent_name ASC;
SELECT patent_id, patent_name, current_owner, acquisition_date FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE current_owner = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals' ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;

SELECT pp.patent_name, pa.acquirer_name, pt.transfer_from FROM pharmaceutical_patents pp JOIN patent_acquisitions pa ON pp.patent_id = pa.acquired_patent_id JOIN patent_transfers pt ON pp.patent_id = pt.transferred_patent_id WHERE pt.transfer_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE acquisition_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY acquisition_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT patent_id, patent_name FROM pharmaceutical_patents ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT acquisition_id, patent_id, new_owner_id, DATE(acquisition_date) AS formatted_date FROM patent_acquisitions WHERE DATE(acquisition_date) >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, country FROM patent_owners WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT patent_id, previous_owner_id, new_owner_id FROM patent_transfers ORDER BY transfer_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT patent_name, owner_id FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patent_id, owner_name FROM pharmaceutical_patents JOIN patent_owners ON pharmaceutical_patents.owner_id = patent_owners.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM patent_acquisitions WHERE acquisition_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patent_transfers ORDER BY transfer_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM patent_ownership ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT patent_name, patent_type FROM patent ORDER BY patent_id ASC;
SELECT company_id, company_name, company_country FROM patent_company WHERE company_country = 'USA';
SELECT patent_id, acquisition_id FROM patent_acquisition WHERE acquiring_company_id = 123;
SELECT patent_id, old_owner_id, new_owner_id FROM patent_transfer WHERE transfer_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_ownership WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT patent_name, patent_description FROM patent ORDER BY patent_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, company_country FROM patent_company WHERE company_country = 'USA';
SELECT patent_id, new_owner_id, transfer_date FROM patent_transfer ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT acquiring_company_id, COUNT(*) FROM patent_acquisition GROUP BY acquiring_company_id;
